definition: (used for transliteration)/old variant of 謳|讴[ou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐洲|欧洲[Ou1 zhou1]/surname Ou
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: This is due to the fact that Euler angles are always expressed relative to the global coordinate system.
sentences.chinese: 這歸咎於歐拉角總是以球座標系表示。

sentences.english: The rotation as Euler angles in degrees relative to the parent transform's rotation.
sentences.chinese: 旋轉作爲歐拉角度，相對於父級的變換旋轉角度。

sentences.english: A study is made on Cauchy problem of compressible Eulers equations with relaxation term.
sentences.chinese: 研究具鬆弛項可壓縮的歐拉方程組柯西問題。

sentences.english: The correctness of the complete Euler equation set is verified with two functional examples.
sentences.chinese: 通過兩個算例驗證了完全歐拉方程組的正確性。

sentences.english: A graph G is supereulerian if G has a spanning eulerian subgraph.
sentences.chinese: 若圖G含有生成歐拉子圖，則稱G是超歐拉的。

sentences.english: A graph G is supereulerian if G has a spanning eulerian subgraph.
sentences.chinese: 若圖G含有生成歐拉子圖，則稱G是超歐拉的。

sentences.english: The Euler angles could be expressed with arbitrarily large rotations.
sentences.chinese: 這裏歐拉角可以用來表示任意大的轉動。

sentences.english: In these cryptosystems, Euler totient functions play an important role.
sentences.chinese: 在這些密碼體制中，歐拉函數起着重要作用。

sentences.english: Formation of Singularities of Smooth Solution Euler Equations with Relaxation Term;
sentences.chinese: 翼型的流場解由歐拉方程的數值解提供。

sentences.english: An asymptotic formula is given for the sum, where is the Eulers function.
sentences.chinese: 設表示歐拉函數，用分析方法給出了的一個漸進公式。

sentences.english: Alone and single-handed, Bahá'u'lláh would achieve sovereignty over it.
sentences.chinese: 巴哈歐拉單憑一己之力就能獲得對它的統治。

sentences.english: Three-dimensional joint rotations have been mainly described by Euler angles.
sentences.chinese: 關節角度通常用歐拉角描述。

sentences.english: This service of the promotion of the Revelation of Bahá'u'lláh is the most confirmed service.
sentences.chinese: 傳揚巴哈歐拉天啓是最受確認的服務。

sentences.english: A fast Euler Solver for planar flows is developed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了一種平面流動的快速歐拉方程解法。

sentences.english: The numerical solution of Euler equations is provided as flow solver.
sentences.chinese: 翼型的流場解由歐拉方程的數值解提供。

sentences.english: Gimbal lock is a phenomenon that easily affects Euler angle representations.
sentences.chinese: 萬向節鎖是一種容易影響到歐拉角表現的現象。

definition: Leonardo da Vinci (1452-1519), Italian Renaissance painter (Tw)
Milton (name)/John Milton (1608-1674), English republican writer and poet, author of Paradise Lost
